mapper.insert: insert into CINEMABOX_MOVIE (MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_THUMBNAIL, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE, MOVIE_RUNNING_TIME, MOVIE_AGE, MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE_CASTING) values (#{no}, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{genre}, #{releaseDate}, #{runningTime}, #{age}, #{director}, #{casting})
insert into CINEMABOX_WISHLISTS (WISHLIST_NO, MOVIE_NO, USER_ID) values (WISHLISTS_SEQ.nextval, #{movieNo}, #{userId})
mapper.update: update CINEMABOX_MOVIE set MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE = #{reservationRate}, MOVIE_CUMULATIVE_AUDIENCE_CNT = #{cumulativeAudienceCnt} where MOVIE_NO = #{no}
mapper.select: select MOVIE_NO as no, MOVIE_TITLE as title, MOVIE_THUMBNAIL as thumbnail, MOVIE_RATING as rating, MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE as reservationRate, MOVIE_CUMULATIVE_AUDIENCE_CNT as cumulativeAudienceCnt, MOVIE_GENRE as genre, MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE as releaseDate, MOVIE_RUNNING_TIME as runningTime, MOVIE_SYNOPSIS as synopsis, MOVIE_TRAILER_FIRST as trailerFirst, MOVIE_TRAILER_SECOND as trailerSecond, MOVIE_AGE as age, MOVIE_DIRECTOR as director, MOVIE_CASTING as casting, MOVIE_LIKE as userLike, MOVIE_STATUS as status, MOVIE_CLOSE_DATE as closeDate from CINEMABOX_MOVIE

select MOVIE_NO as no, MOVIE_TITLE as title, MOVIE_THUMBNAIL as thumbnail, MOVIE_RATING as rating, MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE as reservationRate, MOVIE_CUMULATIVE_AUDIENCE_CNT as cumulativeAudienceCnt, MOVIE_GENRE as genre, MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE as releaseDate, MOVIE_RUNNING_TIME as runningTime, MOVIE_SYNOPSIS as synopsis, MOVIE_TRAILER_FIRST as trailerFirst, MOVIE_TRAILER_SECOND as trailerSecond, MOVIE_AGE as age, MOVIE_DIRECTOR as director, MOVIE_CASTING as casting, MOVIE_LIKE as userLike, MOVIE_STATUS as status, MOVIE_CLOSE_DATE as closeDate from CINEMABOX_MOVIE where MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE <= to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD')) and MOVIE_STATUS = 'N' and MOVIE_SCREENING_STATUS = 'Y'

select MOVIE_NO as no, MOVIE_TITLE as title, MOVIE_STATUS as status, MOVIE_SCREENING_STATUS as screeningStatus, MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE as releasedDate, ADD_MONTHS(MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE, 2) as twoMonth from CINEMABOX_MOVIE where ADD_MONTHS(MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE, 2) <= to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD')) and MOVIE_SCREENING_STATUS = 'Y'

select m.movie_no as movieNo, m.movie_like as movieLike, w.user_id as userId from CINEMABOX_MOVIE m, CINEMABOX_WISHLISTS w where m.movie_no = #{movieNo} and w.user_id = #{userId} and m.movie_no = w.movie_no

select MOVIE_NO as no, MOVIE_TITLE as title, MOVIE_THUMBNAIL as thumbnail, MOVIE_RATING as rating, MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE as reservationRate, MOVIE_CUMULATIVE_AUDIENCE_CNT as cumulativeAudienceCnt, MOVIE_GENRE as genre, MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE as releaseDate, MOVIE_RUNNING_TIME as runningTime, MOVIE_SYNOPSIS as synopsis, MOVIE_TRAILER_FIRST as trailerFirst, MOVIE_TRAILER_SECOND as trailerSecond, MOVIE_AGE as age, MOVIE_DIRECTOR as director, MOVIE_CASTING as casting, MOVIE_LIKE as userLike, MOVIE_STATUS as status, MOVIE_CLOSE_DATE as closeDate from CINEMABOX_MOVIE where MOVIE_NO = #{value}

select MOVIE_NO as no, MOVIE_TITLE as title, MOVIE_THUMBNAIL as thumbnail, MOVIE_RATING as rating, MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE as reservationRate, MOVIE_CUMULATIVE_AUDIENCE_CNT as cumulativeAudienceCnt, MOVIE_GENRE as genre, MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE as releaseDate, MOVIE_RUNNING_TIME as runningTime, MOVIE_SYNOPSIS as synopsis, MOVIE_TRAILER_FIRST as trailerFirst, MOVIE_TRAILER_SECOND as trailerSecond, MOVIE_AGE as age, MOVIE_DIRECTOR as director, MOVIE_CASTING as casting, MOVIE_STATUS as status, MOVIE_CLOSE_DATE as closeDate from ( select
row_number() over (order by MOVIE_RATING desc) row_number,
row_number() over (order by MOVIE_CUMULATIVE_AUDIENCE_CNT desc) row_number,
row_number() over (order by MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE desc) row_number,
row_number() over (order by MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE desc) row_number,
MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE,MOVIE_THUMBNAIL,MOVIE_RATING, MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE,MOVIE_CUMULATIVE_AUDIENCE_CNT, MOVIE_GENRE,MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE,MOVIE_RUNNING_TIME, MOVIE_SYNOPSIS,MOVIE_TRAILER_FIRST,MOVIE_TRAILER_SECOND, MOVIE_AGE,MOVIE_DIRECTOR,MOVIE_CASTING,MOVIE_STATUS,MOVIE_CLOSE_DATE from CINEMABOX_MOVIE where MOVIE_STATUS = 'Y' and MOVIE_SCREENING_STATUS = 'Y' and MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE > sysdate - 50) where row_number <= 12

select MOVIE_NO as no, MOVIE_TITLE as title, MOVIE_THUMBNAIL as thumbnail, MOVIE_RATING as rating, MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE as reservationRate, MOVIE_CUMULATIVE_AUDIENCE_CNT as cumulativeAudienceCnt, MOVIE_GENRE as genre, MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE as releaseDate, MOVIE_RUNNING_TIME as runningTime, MOVIE_SYNOPSIS as synopsis, MOVIE_TRAILER_FIRST as trailerFirst, MOVIE_TRAILER_SECOND as trailerSecond, MOVIE_AGE as age, MOVIE_DIRECTOR as director, MOVIE_CASTING as casting, MOVIE_STATUS as status, MOVIE_CLOSE_DATE as closeDate from ( select
row_number() over (order by MOVIE_TITLE asc) row_number,
row_number() over (order by MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE asc) row_number,
row_number() over (order by MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE asc) row_number,
MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE,MOVIE_THUMBNAIL,MOVIE_RATING, MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE,MOVIE_CUMULATIVE_AUDIENCE_CNT, MOVIE_GENRE,MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE,MOVIE_RUNNING_TIME, MOVIE_SYNOPSIS,MOVIE_TRAILER_FIRST,MOVIE_TRAILER_SECOND, MOVIE_AGE,MOVIE_DIRECTOR,MOVIE_CASTING,MOVIE_STATUS,MOVIE_CLOSE_DATE from CINEMABOX_MOVIE where MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE > sysdate and MOVIE_STATUS = 'N' and MOVIE_SCREENING_STATUS = 'Y') where row_number <= 12

select MOVIE_NO as no, MOVIE_TITLE as title, MOVIE_THUMBNAIL as thumbnail, MOVIE_RATING as rating, MOVIE_RESERVATION_RATE as reservationRate, MOVIE_CUMULATIVE_AUDIENCE_CNT as cumulativeAudienceCnt, MOVIE_GENRE as genre, MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE as releaseDate, MOVIE_RUNNING_TIME as runningTime, MOVIE_SYNOPSIS as synopsis, MOVIE_TRAILER_FIRST as trailerFirst, MOVIE_TRAILER_SECOND as trailerSecond, MOVIE_AGE as age, MOVIE_DIRECTOR as director, MOVIE_CASTING as casting, MOVIE_LIKE as userLike, MOVIE_STATUS as status, MOVIE_CLOSE_DATE as closeDate from CINEMABOX_MOVIE where MOVIE_TITLE like '%'||#{value}||'%' and MOVIE_SCREENING_STATUS = 'Y'
